description:
BRAND NEW GAME! Explore the mysterious land of Kalevala on your Palm Pre! 

Slidetoplay.com 4+/Must Have: "Beautiful soundtrack; highly addictive gameplay; interesting mix of puzzle and simulation." 

4/5 GameZebo.com: "Stunning graphics. Plenty of match-3 fun to had. Lovingly crafted blend of match-3 and building sim." 

Choose your favorite hero and lead your tribe towards a bright new future in the lands of Kalevala. Exciting new match-3 mechanics, powerful hero powerups, and an extensive village building game provide hours of exciting new entertainment. Experience over 140 hand made levels featuring never before seen match-3 game play like lock bomb combos and tar fights. Build your own village from scratch and see how it starts to thrive and produce wealth. Can your tribe acquire the fabled Sampo? 

Features: 

-Match and build your very own custom village. 
-Over 140 unique hand made levels. 
-Eight powerful heroes with distinct abilities. 
-Story with english language voice overs. 
-Play as long as you like after completing the story. 
-Unique match-3 mechanics like tar fight and lock bombs.
